name: Hive Mapping Cooperative 2014-2016
tagline: A project started in Chicago focused on identify and curating digital tools for collaborative teen-led inquiry.
body:
### Project Goals
The Hive Mapping Cooperative (HMC) was started to that Chicago teens and program providers would have an accessible suite of free and/or open source digital tools to collect media-rich spatial data, generate dynamic maps and visualization, and collaborate across programs on youth-led inquiry and narratives. 

### Project Outcomes
An increase in youth comfort level, interest, and proficiency in using digital technologies for data collection, visualization, and sharing
Youth collaborations across programs on issues and topics of shared interest
A streamlined suite of collaborative data collection, visualization, and data sharing tools with best practices for implementation in teen programs

###Funded through [The Hive Chicago Fund for Connected Learning](http://hivechicago.org/about/fund/) at [The Chicago Community Trust](http://www.cct.org/) .
